Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the use of biometric identity verification devices for the purchase of alcoholic beverages and tobacco products
Summary: Relates to the use of biometric identity verification devices for the purchase of alcoholic beverages and tobacco products; authorizes a licensee, its agent or employee to determine a person's age when purchasing alcoholic beverages or tobacco products by use of a biometric identity verification device; establishes where the use of the device indicates that the person is under the age of twenty-one, the attempted purchase of the alcoholic beverage shall be denied.
LawCode: Amd §65-b, ABC L; amd §§1399-bb & 1399-cc, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law and the public health law, in relation to the use of biometric identity verification devices for the purchase of alcoholic beverages and tobacco products
